text:
e="preserve">Volodymyr Fedorovych Lozynskyi or Vladimir Fyodorovich Lozinsky (;; 6 February 1955 – 17 July 2020) was a Soviet-Ukrainian football player and Ukrainian coach. Between 1979 to 1982, he played for the Soviet Union national football team. He also played for FC Dynamo Kyiv between 1973 to 1984. He managed the national student team.
Loztnskyi died on 17 July 2020, aged 65.
